topic.title: DBOS service components
topic.shortdesc: DBOS component is the container for program that implements the business logic and configuration information. The program is a set of back-end operations that the application runs for the user. A component offers a service to other components and in turn consumes functions offered by other services using service-oriented interfaces.

body.p: A manufacturer to create its domain products (solutions) under its brand may develop own service components or apply third party service components. If third party service component is integrated to manufacturer product it becomes manufacturer domain service component and license information is provided.
We must separate tools from integrated to domain products third party service components.
